remarks: Commute the "subgroups commute" predicate.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
statement:
cntzrecd.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
cntzrecd.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
cntzrecd.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
cntzrecd.s $e |- ( ph -> T C_ ( Z ` U ) ) $.
cntzrecd $p |- ( ph -> U C_ ( Z ` T ) ) $.
